summary: DRIVING AT FREEWAY SPEEDS SOME BUMPS OR UNEVEN SURFACE CAUSE CAR TO LURCH.  ENGINE SHUTS DOWN TO NO THROTTLE; THIS IS VERY DISCONCERTING FOR DRIVER.  HAPPENS 2-3 TIMES A MONTH ON SUCH ROADS.  I SUSPECT THE SKID CONTROL.  WHEN THAT IS TURNED OFF IT DOES NOT DO IT.  JEEP NEEDS TO FIX THIS.  CAR RECOVERS AFTER 2-3 SECONDS BUT IN MEANTIME THIS COULD EASILY CAUSE CAR BEHIND TO HIT YOU.  SO FAR HAVE BEEN LUCKY THIS DID NOT HAPPEN.
